notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: One step in the biosynthesis of morphine is the reaction of dopamine with p-hydroxyphenylacetaldehyde to give (S)-norcoclaurine. Assuming that the reaction is acid-catalyzed, propose a mechanism.
